msbt.message: They'll never learn if I just step in and do it myself. But if I don't do it, I get the feeling it won't get done.<20_3 arg="0" />Oh, hey. Sorry, I was in my own little world there. I think I've got a thing to take care of, so catch you later!
How did I get roped into this? I dunnowould do the trick?Nah. <20_3 arg="0" />Sorry, , I'm too wrapped up in a big decision to talk now. Hit me up later, OK?

<10_14 arg="20" />GAAAAAAHHH!<10_8 arg="30" /><10_9 />My brain's running so hot that I'm gonna catch a fever, !<20_3 arg="0" />I gotta write all this down before it boils away! Whatever you wanted is gonna have to wait for now!
